meanings.definition: A three-dimensional pixel used in computer graphics.
meanings.sent1: The game world is made up of tiny voxels that create the 3D environment.
meanings.sent2: The artist carefully adjusted the colors of each voxel to perfect the digital painting.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally stepped on a voxel and now the character is stuck in the ground!
meanings.sent4: The city skyline was a mosaic of glowing voxels against the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The scientist explained that voxels are like building blocks for virtual reality.

meanings.definition: The smallest distinguishable element of a three-dimensional image or volume.
meanings.sent1: The medical scan revealed tiny voxels that showed the detailed structure of the brain.
meanings.sent2: The high-resolution monitor displayed the image with clarity down to the individual voxel.
meanings.sent3: I found a hidden message in the voxels of the picture when I zoomed in closely.
meanings.sent4: Her memories were like voxels, each one a small piece contributing to the whole picture of her past.
meanings.sent5: The puzzle was challenging, with each voxel needing to be placed in the correct spot to reveal the final image.
